stories.text:

stories.text: A gartner report came out recently which said some positive things about oracle's cloud offering. But I tried to google for reviews from actual users/customers and came up with nothing. No  articles on medium about the good and bad of the service. Has anyone here worked with OC and can share their experience?
stories.title: Ask HN: What do you think about the Oracle Cloud?
Angela Merkel: From Poor Girl in East Germany to the 'Empress of Europe'
